text: Leopold Raymond Maurice François Marie Ghislain Lippens (20 October 1941 – 19 February 2021) was a Belgian politician. He was mayor of Knokke-Heist for over 40 years, between 1979 until his death in 2021. Lippens died on 19 February 2021 in Knokke from leukaemia, aged 79. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from leukemia Category:Belgian mayors Category:People from West Flanders
title: Leopold Lippens
